TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Configuration extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示特定電腦、應用程式或資源所適用的組態檔。

span.span: Represents a configuration file that is applicable to a particular computer, application, or resource.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態設定會儲存在組態檔的階層。Configuration settings are stored in a hierarchy of configuration files. 類別的執行個體表示從所有套用至特定的實際實體，例如電腦，或邏輯實體，例如應用程式或網站的組態檔的組態設定的合併的檢視。The class instance represents the merged view of the configuration settings from all of the configuration files that apply to a specific physical entity, such as a computer, or to a logical entity, such as an application or a Web site. 在本機電腦上或遠端伺服器上，可以存在的邏輯實體。The logical entity can exist on the local computer or on a remote server. 如需組態檔的資訊，請參閱[設定應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f)和[ASP.NET 組態檔](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01505090-9114-41a7-93ca-068e2283ed3d)。For information about configuration files, see [Configuring Apps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f) and [ASP.NET Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01505090-9114-41a7-93ca-068e2283ed3d). 當沒有組態檔存在指定的實體，物件表示 Machine.config 檔案所定義的預設組態設定。When no configuration file exists for a specified entity, the object represents the default configuration settings as defined by the Machine.config file. 您可以取得物件使用的下列類別：You can get a object by using the following classes: - 類別，如果您的實體為用戶端應用程式。The class, if your entity is a client application. - 類別，如果實體是 Web 應用程式。The class, if your entity is a Web application. 傳回方法的名稱物件開頭為 「 開啟 」。The names of the methods that return a object begin with "Open". 您也可以產生組態檔中的組態設定表示物件。You can also generate a configuration file that represents the configuration settings in a object. 若要執行此工作，請使用下列的其中一個方法：To do this, use one of the following methods: - 呼叫方法來建立新的組態檔。Call the method to create a new configuration file. - 呼叫方法來產生新的組態檔，另一個位置。Call the method to generate a new configuration file at another location. 建立組態檔的方法名稱的開頭 [儲存]。The names of the methods that create configuration files begin with "Save". > [!NOTE] > 若要啟用存取遠端電腦上的組態設定，請使用 Aspnet_regiis 命令列工具。To enable access to configuration settings on a remote computer, use the Aspnet_regiis command-line tool. 如需這項工具的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET IIS 註冊工具 (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b)。For more information about this tool, see [ASP.NET IIS Registration Tool (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b). 如需建立和存取.NET Framework 中包含的內建區段以外的自訂組態設定資訊，請參閱。For information about creating and accessing custom configuration settings other than the intrinsic sections included in the .NET Framework, refer to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以存取組態檔項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to access configuration file elements. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#31)]

block.para:
類別會提供以程式設計方式存取編輯組態檔。
The class provides programmatic access for editing configuration files.
您可以使用所提供的 「 開啟 」 方法的其中一個類別針對 Web 應用程式，或由用戶端應用程式的類別。
You use one of the "Open" methods provided by the class for Web applications or by the class for client applications.
這些方法會傳回物件，接著提供的方法和處理基礎的組態檔的屬性。
These methods return a object, which in turn provides the methods and properties that handle the underlying configuration files.
您可以存取這些檔案進行讀取或寫入組態資訊。
You can access these files for reading or writing configuration information.
您使用方法或方法來讀取設定資訊。
You use the method or the method to read configuration information.
請注意使用者讀取或處理序必須具有下列權限：
Note that the user or process that reads must have the following permissions:
- 讀取組態檔，在目前的組態階層層級上的權限。Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 讀取權限的所有父組態檔。Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.如果您的應用程式需要它自己的設定唯讀存取，建議您使用Web 應用程式的方法多載。If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, it is recommended that you use the method overloads for Web applications.用戶端應用程式，使用方法。For client application, use the method.這些方法會提供存取目前的應用程式的快取的設定值，其具有較佳的效能比類別。These methods provide access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.
如果您使用靜態採用 path 參數的方法，path 參數必須參考應用程式中的程式碼正在執行，否則會忽略此參數並傳回目前執行的應用程式的組態資訊。If you use a static method that takes a path parameter, the path parameter must refer to the application in which the code is running, otherwise the parameter is ignored and configuration information for the currently running application is returned.您可以使用其中一種寫入組態資訊的方法。You use one of the methods to write configuration information.請注意，寫入的處理序的使用者必須具有下列權限：Note that the user or process that writes must have the following permissions:
- 寫入設定檔案和目錄，在目前的組態階層層級上的權限。Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 讀取所有的組態檔的權限。Read permissions on all the configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppSettings As AppSettingsSection
public: property System::Configuration::AppSettingsSection ^ AppSettings { System::Configuration::AppSettingsSection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得此 物件所套用的 物件組態區段。

span.span: Gets the object configuration section that applies to this object.

value.span: 物件，表示此 物件所套用的 組態區段。

span.span: An object representing the configuration section that applies to this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取及變更`appSettings`依預設開啟組態檔中定義的組態區段。Use the property to access and change the `appSettings` configuration section defined by default in the open configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AssemblyStringTransformer As Func(Of String, String)

public: property Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ AssemblyStringTransformer { Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定用來在組態檔中轉換組件字串的函式委派。

span.span: Specifies a function delegate that is used to transform assembly strings in configuration files.
A delegate that transforms type strings.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓取用者的.NET Framework 組態系統來設定用來轉換在組態檔中找到的組件字串函式委派。This property enables a consumer of the .NET Framework configuration system to set a function delegate that is used to transform assembly strings found in configuration files. [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 專案以舊版.NET Framework 為目標時，請使用這個屬性。 uses this property when a project is targeted for an earlier version of the .NET Framework. 此函式可確保，組件字串的格式是否正確的.NET framework 目標版本更新組態檔時。The function makes sure that assembly strings are formatted correctly for the targeted version of the .NET Framework when configuration files are updated.

value.span: 這個 物件所表示的組態檔之實體路徑。

span.span: The physical path to the configuration file represented by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個值屬性表示的合併的檢視，且應用程式沒有實際的檔案存在，會傳回父層設定檔的路徑。If the value for this property represents a merged view and no actual file exists for the application, the path to the parent configuration file is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態設定會包含類似的設定，以便在一起的區段內。Configuration settings are contained within sections that group similar settings together for convenience. 方法擷取的組態區段的名稱。The method retrieves a configuration section by its name. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來存取自訂區段。The following example shows how to use the method to access a custom section. 定義類別，用於儲存之資訊的完整範例程式碼`CustomSection`區段中，請參閱類別概觀。For the complete example code that defines a class that stores information for the `CustomSection` section, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasFile As Boolean
public: property bool HasFile { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出這個 物件所表示的資源是否有組態檔存在。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a file exists for the resource represented by this object.

value.span: 如果有組態檔，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if there is a configuration file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性也會傳回`true`資源所代表的當物件會繼承 Web.config 檔案中的設定。The property also returns `true` when the resource represented by this object inherits settings from a Web.config file. 屬性會傳回`false`時這物件都代表特定位置的組態。The property returns `false` when this object represents a location-specific configuration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Locations As ConfigurationLocationCollection

summary.span: 取得這個 物件中定義的位置。

span.span: Gets the locations defined within this object.

value.span: ，包含這個 物件中定義的位置。

span.span: A containing the locations defined within this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時，才適用屬性會傳回`true`。The property applies only when the property returns `true`. 如果這個組態會繼承它的所有設定，或所定義的任何位置，則會傳回空集合。If this configuration inherits all of its settings, or no locations are defined, an empty collection is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NamespaceDeclared { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出組態檔是否有 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the configuration file has an XML namespace.

value.span: 如果組態檔有 XML 命名空間，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the configuration file has an XML namespace; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態檔會格式化成 XML 檔案，但非必要的 XML 命名空間。Configuration files are formatted as XML files, but an XML namespace is not required. 如果此值為`true`之後開啟物件時，則檔案會包含命名空間的參考。If this value is `true` after the object is opened, then the file contains a namespace reference. 如果設定為`true`之前儲存物件時，則會命名空間參考會加入至檔案。If it is set to `true` before the object is saved, then a namespace reference will be added to the file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RootSectionGroup As ConfigurationSectionGroup

summary.span: 取得這個 物件的根 。

span.span: Gets the root for this object.

value.span: 這個 物件的根區段群組。

span.span: The root section group for this object.

summary.span: 將包含在這個 物件中的組態設定寫入至目前的 XML 組態檔。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 將包含在這個 物件中的組態設定寫入至目前的 XML 組態檔。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仍然存在此以來已修改任何組態設定建立物件。The method persists any configuration settings that have been modified since this object was created. 如果組態檔不存在於所代表的實體位置屬性，會包含任何繼承的組態與不同的設定建立新的組態檔。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果組態檔已變更過這建立物件，就會發生執行階段錯誤。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 「 建立者擁有者 」 列出 ACL （存取控制清單） 中包含組態檔中，與目前使用者的目錄時變成新的擁有者的檔案，並且會繼承授與 「 建立者擁有者 」 的權限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 這會導致目前的使用者權限提高，並移除先前擁有者的權限。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner.

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
\- or -
The configuration file has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode saveMode) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void Save(valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode mode) cil managed

summary.span: 將包含在這個 物件中的組態設定寫入至目前的 XML 組態檔。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存的組態設定物件根據`saveMode`參數。The method persists configuration settings in the object based on the `saveMode` parameter. 如果組態檔不存在於所代表的實體位置屬性，會包含任何繼承的組態與不同的設定建立新的組態檔。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果組態檔已變更過這建立物件，就會發生執行階段錯誤。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 「 建立者擁有者 」 列出 ACL （存取控制清單） 中包含組態檔中，與目前使用者的目錄時變成新的擁有者的檔案，並且會繼承授與 「 建立者擁有者 」 的權限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 這會導致目前的使用者權限提高，並移除先前擁有者的權限。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來儲存自訂區段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to save a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#2)]

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
\- or -
The configuration file has changed.

summary.span: 將包含在這個 物件中的組態設定寫入至目前的 XML 組態檔。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存的組態設定物件根據`saveMode`和`forceSaveAll`參數。The method persists configuration settings in the object based on the `saveMode` and `forceSaveAll` parameters. 如果組態檔不存在於所代表的實體位置屬性，會包含任何繼承的組態與不同的設定建立新的組態檔...If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration.. 如果組態檔已變更過這建立物件，就會發生執行階段錯誤。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 「 建立者擁有者 」 列出 ACL （存取控制清單） 中包含組態檔中，與目前使用者的目錄時變成新的擁有者的檔案，並且會繼承授與 「 建立者擁有者 」 的權限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 這會導致目前的使用者權限提高，並移除先前擁有者的權限。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner.

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
\- or -
The configuration file has changed.

summary.span: 將包含在這個 物件中的組態設定寫入至指定的 XML 組態檔。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the specified XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仍然存在此以來已修改任何組態設定物件建立新的檔案。The method persists any configuration settings that have been modified since this object was created to a new file. 如果組態檔不存在於所代表的實體位置If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the 屬性，將建立新的組態檔，以包含任何設定，不同於繼承的組態... property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration.. 如果組態檔已變更過這建立物件，就會發生執行階段錯誤。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs.

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
\- or -
The configuration file has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename, valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode saveMode) cil managed

.method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename, valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode mode) cil managed
Public Sub SaveAs (filename As String, mode As ConfigurationSaveMode)

param.name: filename
param.span: 要儲存組態檔的路徑和檔案名稱。

span.span: The path and file name to save the configuration file to.

summary.span: 將包含在這個 物件中的組態設定寫入至指定的 XML 組態檔。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the specified XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存的組態設定到新的檔案物件根據`saveMode`參數。The method persists configuration settings in the object to a new file based on the `saveMode` parameter. 如果組態檔不存在於所代表的實體位置屬性，會包含任何繼承的組態與不同的設定建立新的組態檔...If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration.. 如果組態檔已變更過這建立物件，就會發生執行階段錯誤。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs.

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
\- or -
The configuration file has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveAs (string filename, System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode saveMode, bool forceSaveAll);
.method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename, valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode saveMode, bool forceSaveAll) cil managed
Public Sub SaveAs (filename As String, saveMode As ConfigurationSaveMode, forceSaveAll As Boolean)
public: void SaveAs(System::String ^ filename, System::Configuration::ConfigurationSaveMode saveMode, bool forceSaveAll);
public void SaveAs (string filename, System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode mode, bool forceUpdateAll);
.method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename, valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode mode, bool forceUpdateAll) cil managed
Public Sub SaveAs (filename As String, mode As ConfigurationSaveMode, forceUpdateAll As Boolean)
public: void SaveAs(System::String ^ filename, System::Configuration::ConfigurationSaveMode mode, bool forceUpdateAll);

param.name: filename
param.span: 要儲存組態檔的路徑和檔案名稱。

span.span: The path and file name to save the configuration file to.

summary.span: 將包含在這個 物件中的組態設定寫入至指定的 XML 組態檔。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the specified XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存的組態設定到新的檔案物件根據`saveMode`和`forceSaveAll`參數。The method persists configuration settings in the object to a new file based on the `saveMode` and `forceSaveAll` parameters. 如果組態檔不存在於所代表的實體位置屬性，會包含任何繼承的組態與不同的設定建立新的組態檔。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果組態檔已變更過這建立物件，就會發生執行階段錯誤。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#4)]

span.span: is null or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SectionGroups As ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection

summary.span: 取得這個組態所定義的區段群組集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the section groups defined by this configuration.

value.span: 集合，表示這個 物件的區段群組集合。

span.span: A collection representing the collection of section groups for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組態區段可以組合成群組，為了方便起見，並新增的功能。Configuration sections can be combined into groups for convenience and added functionality. 存取屬性，以擷取區段群組的集合，這個物件物件。Access the property to retrieve the object representing the collection of section groups for this object. 如果這個物件都代表繼承的檢視，合併區段群組將會傳回清單。If this object represents an inherited view, the merged list of section groups will be returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sections As ConfigurationSectionCollection

summary.span: 取得這個 物件所定義的區段集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the sections defined by this object.

value.span: 這個 物件所定義的區段集合。

span.span: A collection of the sections defined by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取屬性，以擷取物件，代表這個區段集合物件。Access the property to retrieve a object representing the collection of sections for this object. 如果這個物件都代表合併的組態，合併的各節將會傳回清單。If this object represents a merged configuration, the merged list of sections will be returned. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取屬性值，並顯示集合中的區段數目。The following example shows how to retrieve the property value and to display the number of the sections in the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ TargetFramework { System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ value); };

summary.span: 以目前版本之前的版本為目標時，指定 .NET Framework 的目標版本。

span.span: Specifies the targeted version of the .NET Framework when a version earlier than the current one is targeted.
The name of the targeted version of the .NET Framework.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示以目前版本為目標。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that the current version is targeted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當組態系統會序列化為 XML 的組態物件的階層架構時，它會檢查這個屬性的值。When the configuration system serializes a hierarchy of configuration objects to XML, it checks the value of this property. 如果屬性不是`null`，組態系統會針對每個組態區段群組和組態區段來執行版本檢查。If the property is not `null`, the configuration system performs version checks for each configuration section group and configuration section. 組態系統也會執行版本檢查標示為已變更不同版本之間的個別組態屬性。The configuration system also performs version checks for individual configuration properties that are marked as having changed across versions. (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 )。組態系統也會設定區段中的組態項目執行版本檢查。(For more information, see .) The configuration system also performs version checks for configuration elements in configuration sections. 如果這個屬性的值為`null`，組態系統不會在序列化期間執行任何版本檢查。If the value of this property is `null`, the configuration system does not perform any version checks during serialization.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TypeStringTransformer As Func(Of String, String)
public: property Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ TypeStringTransformer { Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定用來在組態檔中轉換型別字串的函式委派。

span.span: Specifies a function delegate that is used to transform type strings in configuration files.
A delegate that transforms type strings.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓取用者的.NET Framework 組態系統設定函式委派，用來轉換在組態檔中找到的型別字串。This property enables a consumer of the .NET Framework configuration system to set a function delegate that is used to transform type strings found in configuration files. [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 專案以舊版.NET Framework 為目標時，請使用這個屬性。 uses this property when a project is targeted for an earlier version of the .NET Framework. 此函式可確保，類型字串的格式是否正確的.NET framework 目標版本更新組態檔時。The function makes sure that type strings are formatted correctly for the targeted version of the .NET Framework when configuration files are updated.
